org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.context

Class EvaluatorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.context.EvaluatorContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ActiveContext, ContextBase, ContextSubmittable, TaskSubmittable, Identifiable

    public final class EvaluatorContext
extends Object
implements ActiveContext
    Driver-side representation of a Context on an Evaluator.
